channel.title: Welcome on My New Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on My New Blog

item.title: The Future of Web Development
item.description:
Web development is constantly evolving. From static sites to SPAs and now back to server-side rendering, the cycle continues.

Why Speed Matters

In the modern web, performance is everything.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Welcome

I’m a developer and writer. This is my personal blog where I share my thoughts on technology, lifestyle, and my ongoing projects.

What I write about

  • Tech: Coding, software architecture, and new tools.
  • Lifestyle: Hobbies, travel, and personal growth.
  • Projects: Showcases of my work.

item.title: Minimalism in Daily Life
item.description:
Adopting a minimalist lifestyle has cleared my mind and my space.

“Less is more.”

It’s not just about owning less, it’s about valuing more.

item.title: My Personal Blog Revamp
item.description:
I recently decided to revamp my blog using Hugo and the Poison theme.

Goals

  1. Clean aesthetics.
  2. Fast load times.
  3. Easy content management.
